title: Treat a PC fan to this $50 Microsoft super bundle featuring Microsoft Office Pro 2019 and Windows 11 Pro
content:
Macworld

If you’ve got a PC lover on your shopping list, gift them something from their favorite brand: Microsoft. Perfect as a last-minute gift, this all-in-one Microsoft bundle with Microsoft Office Pro 2019 and Windows 11 Pro lifetime licenses is now only $49.97 (reg. $408) if purchased by January 1.

First in this package is MS Office Pro Plus 2019. While this isn’t the latest iteration of Microsoft’s top-rated productivity suite, it comes with familiar favorites like Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, Teams, Outlook, and OneNote. It even comes with Publisher, helpful for creating docs like newsletters and flyers, and Access, an app perfect for managing large amounts of data.

Users will also get Microsoft’s most up-to-date OS, Windows 11 Pro, the ultimate upgrade to supercharge any PC. It’s user-friendly and packed with productivity-enhancing features like customizable widgets, snap layouts, and seamless re-docking. Professionals will appreciate the OS’s Microsoft Teams and Microsoft Remote Desktop, and techies will enjoy advanced security features like Windows Information Protection, Microsoft Information Protection, BitLocker Encryption, Smart App Control, and more.

Give a techie a last-minute present that boosts security, productivity, and efficiency.

Get this comprehensive bundle featuring Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows and Windows 11 Pro for just $49.97 through January 1 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific. No coupon needed.
